title: Open Badges Version 2.1 IMS Candidate Final JSON Schema Binding (getAssertions-200-responsepayload-schema)

status.description: The 'status' property MUST appear on all responses.

results.description: A list of zero or more assertions responsive to the request.

AssertionOrSignedAssertionDType.description: Can be an Assertion object or a JWT string representing a signed Assertion.

error.description: Model Primitive Datatype = String. A nullable string and the human-readable message describing the problem.

statusCode.description: Model Primitive Datatype = PositiveInteger. The HTTP status code of the response.

statusText.description: A string matching one of the enumerated and allowed values for the given endpoint.
